name: Disable Plugin on Removal
objective: To verify that plugins don't automatically run upon reinstalling.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes:
JB - Friday, December 4, 2020
- Moved to automated

inline.description:
1. Go to system console
  2. Install any plugin (by uploading a file or installing via url https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-demo/releases/download/v0.1.0/com.mattermost.demo-plugin-0.1.0.tar.gz)
  3. Enable plugin
  4. Remove plugin
  5. Install previously installed plugin
inline.expectedResult: Plugin is installed and is disabled
